attributes.action: invite Her Majesty the Queen to the 65th D-Day landing anniversary ceremonies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Her Majesty is the only surviving head of state to have served in uniform during WW2. Gordon Brown intends to represent Britain at the services in Normandy. It is known that the Queen would welcome an invitation.

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
